Frenzy Handbook    

   start => doc_en

About this documentation

Frenzy LiveCD is based on FreeBSD. If you are new to this system it is highly recommended that first of all you read FreeBSD documentation (so called Handbook).

  • This documentation can be found of Frenzy LiveCD here: /usr/share/doc/en_US.ISO8859-1/books/handbook/index.html
  • You also can start graphic shell by typing startx and choose “Help” - “FreeBSD: User Manual”
  • FreeBSD Handbook in the Internet

To find the information on a specific command or a config file you can type “man command-or-file-name” or “info command-or-file-name“.

Almost all software contains documentation on it, wich can be found in this catalogues:

  • /usr/local/share/doc
  • /usr/X11R6/share/doc
